shortDescriptionForSaas: Made for ambitious developers to ship multi-tenant applications in minutes...not days.
multipleSubheading: Using Next.js, Stripe, Supabase, Resend & more to deliver founders a scalable, secure and performant startboard.
noCreditCardRequired: Free plan. No credit card required.
bestTool: The best launchpad in the space
unbeatableFeatures: Use our GPT to customize the pre-built UX, which includes: this landing pag & SaaS app with Admin Panel, 2FA login, Memberships & Invites, Subscription management, Documentation markdown & UI Animations
authenticationDescription: Out of the box authentication for users with roles, invites, authenticator-app and social logins.
authenticationDetail: Our authentication system is built on top of the industry-leading PaaS such as Supabase and Firebase. It is secure, easy-to-use, and fully customizable. It supports email/password, social logins, and more.
multiTenancyDescription: Powerful Multi-Tenancy Features for Maximum Flexibility and Efficiency
teamManagementDescription: Effortlessly Manage and Organize Your Team Members
uiThemesDescription: Using Resend & ConvertKit, send welcome emails and newsletters for your business.
uiComponentsDescription: Opt to build pages using markdown instead of JSX. View Documentation as an example.
blogAndDocumentationDescription: Replace the need for a backend server with serverless functions and Supabase.
dashboardDescription: Checkout the fantastic dashboard pages for users and admin.
dashboardDetail: Our admin role offers an overview of your business traction in-product. It shows at a glance all you need to know about your business, users & payments. We've pre-built KPIs for users of your service. It is fully customizable and extendable.
cancelAnytime: Get started for free. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.
readyToTakeSaasBusiness: Stripe baked in for you to start earning money
upgradeWhenYouAreReady: Pre-built to be a freemium saas offer. Accept payments with Stripe.
